meanings.definition: A smaller division or branch of a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The subcolleges offer specialized courses for students.
meanings.sent2: I am studying at one of the subcolleges of the university.
meanings.sent3: The subcolleges decided to have a pizza party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of knowledge, the subcolleges are like blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subcolleges opened up new opportunities for me.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing a college or university into smaller units.
meanings.sent1: The subcolleges were created to improve efficiency in the university system.
meanings.sent2: She led the initiative for the subcolleges to enhance collaboration among departments.
meanings.sent3: The subcolleges decided to have a dance-off to determine the best division.
meanings.sent4: The concept of subcolleges is like breaking a big puzzle into smaller, manageable pieces.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the subcolleges felt like exploring a maze of opportunities.
